name: Joyce's Toys and Tools
body: I like building tools to help my games play more easily. Here's some of what I've made. ## Federation Commander Dashboard ### Run the app! ### Description A tool to help players of the amazing tactical miniatures combat game _Federation Commander_. This tool combines several pieces together: * Soundboard - Enrich your game with the sounds of science fiction! * Dice Roller - Never physically touch dice again! * Table lookups - No need to look up what damage your attack does on chart 5-A12. Just click the button. * Rules Reminders - Did you remember that you can't target weapons or power systems beyond range 10? Stuff like this is made obvious by the app.
